text:
It would be nice if the documention mentioned the version of Ant that introduced
a new task or attribute.  For example, put "new in 1.5" for anything added in
1.5.  That way it's easier to write ant files that are backward compatible, for
those of us who need to do that.
creator: bslesins@best.com

text:
I am marking later as when we go to autogenerated docs, they will pick up the 
@since tags in the javadocs.

If you are going to do backwards compatible ant, use an old build file, test 
on an old version of ant. its the only way to be sure.

trouble with doing backwards compatible stuff is that there are too many other 
changes i.e. bug fixes, that you need to be aware of and address.
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
